text:
Instruction: As an expert in code conversion, your task is to convert the provided Jinja template to its equivalent Blended template. Blended is a variant of Jinja with strict type checking and scoping rules.

### Task Description:
convert variable "server_name" to lowercase, then concatenate with ".local" and print "Server: " + result

### Jinja Template:
{{ 'Server: ' + server_name.lower() + '.local' }}

### Blended Template:
{% set temp = "Server: " ~ lower(server_name) ~ ".local" %}{% print temp %}

Instruction: As an expert in code conversion, your task is to convert the provided Jinja template to its equivalent Blended template. Blended is a variant of Jinja with strict type checking and scoping rules.

### Task Description:
convert "ADMIN" to lowercase and print it

### Jinja Template:
{{ "ADMIN" | lower }}

### Blended Template:
{% print lower("ADMIN") %}

Instruction: As an expert in code conversion, your task is to convert the provided Jinja template to its equivalent Blended template. Blended is a variant of Jinja with strict type checking and scoping rules.

### Task Description:
truncate variable "rating", then set "stars" to result + " stars", then render it

### Jinja Template:
{{ rating|truncate(3) }} stars

### Blended Template:
{% set stars = truncate(rating) ~ " stars" %} {{ stars }}

Instruction: As an expert in code conversion, your task is to convert the provided Jinja template to its equivalent Blended template. Blended is a variant of Jinja with strict type checking and scoping rules.

### Task Description:
Write a template to apply floor function to 15.99 and store in variable "rounded_price", then print it

### Jinja Template:
{% set rounded_price = 15.99 | floor %} {{rounded_price}}

### Blended Template:
{% set rounded_price = 15.99 | floor %} {% print rounded_price %}

Instruction: As an expert in code conversion, your task is to convert the provided Jinja template to its equivalent Blended template. Blended is a variant of Jinja with strict type checking and scoping rules.

### Task Description:
set variable "access" to "granted" if role == "admin", else "denied", then render it

### Jinja Template:
{% set access = "granted" if role == "admin" else "denied" %}

### Blended Template:
{% set access = "" %} {% if role == "admin" %} {% set access = "granted" %} {% else %} {% set access = "denied" %} {% endif %} {{access}}
